comingFeatures.title: Request account certificates
comingFeatures.description: Being able to request a certificate of title of an account, for example, without having to go to the branch.

comingFeatures.title: ON/OFF cards depending on the merchant
comingFeatures.description: Being able to select what type of shopping my card should be OFF for, e.g. online shopping.

comingFeatures.title: Build piggy banks
comingFeatures.description: It would great to have a section for savings.

comingFeatures.title: Pets
comingFeatures.description: Having a section for our pets (insurance, inoculation costs, monthly vet expenses, etc.)

comingFeatures.title: Add notes to activity
comingFeatures.description: Being able to add comments to account and card activity.

alreadyImplementedFeatures.title: Card subscriptions
alreadyImplementedFeatures.description: A section with a list of the merchants where I have registered my card for online payments (e.g. Zara) and the bills I have linked to my account (e.g. Netflix).

alreadyImplementedFeatures.title: Discreet mode
alreadyImplementedFeatures.description: Being able to enable a “discreet mode” so that the product balances are not shown in the accounts overview.

alreadyImplementedFeatures.title: Customisation
alreadyImplementedFeatures.description: Being able to choose the accounts overview and theme of the photos shown on the login page.

alreadyImplementedFeatures.title: See future bills
alreadyImplementedFeatures.description: Being able to see future activity.

alreadyImplementedFeatures.title: Shortcuts
alreadyImplementedFeatures.description: Having access to the most frequently used transactions directly from the accounts overview.
